text: JetBlue Airways is an American low-cost airline owned by JetBlue Airways Corporation. The company is headquartered in Long Island City, a neighborhood in New York City. Its main base is John F. Kennedy International Airport. In 2001, JetBlue began a focus city operation at Long Beach in Los Angeles County, California. Another was opened at Logan International Airport in Boston, Massachusetts in 2004. It also has focus city operations at Fort Lauderdale – Hollywood International Airport, Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport, and Orlando International Airport. The airline mainly serves destinations in the United States, along with flights to the Caribbean, the Bahamas, Bermuda, and Mexico. As of February 2021, JetBlue has 267 airplanes, with 8 on order, and flies to 99 cities. == Gallery == File:JetBlue E-190 (N203JB).jpg|A JetBlue Airways E190. File:N945JT LAX (23117273744).jpg|A JetBlue "Mint" A321. File:Idlewild Blue JetBlue T5 JFK.jpg|A JetBlue airplane parked at the gate.
